privacy.subtitle: YolsuzluÄŸu ifÅŸa eden muhbirler iÃ§in maksimum anonimlik
privacy.cardZeroIpDescription: No IP addresses are stored in our database. Your location and identity remain completely anonymous.
privacy.cardAnonymousDescription: Rate limiting uses session tokens instead of IP tracking. Browse and upload without fear.
privacy.cardPrivacyFirstDescription: File uploads are processed without storing any identifying information about the uploader.
privacy.cardCleanServerDescription: System logs are configured to exclude IP addresses and other identifying information.
privacy.openSourceDescription: Don't just trust our promises â€“ verify our privacy implementations yourself. Our complete source code is available on GitHub, allowing security researchers, privacy advocates, and journalists to audit our systems.
privacy.infrastructureDescription: Privacy protection at every technical layer:
privacy.layerApplication: Application Layer: Zero IP storage, anonymous uploads, privacy-first design
privacy.layerDatabase: Database Layer: No personal information stored, secure document handling
privacy.layerServer: Server Layer: Nginx logs exclude IP addresses, no tracking headers
privacy.layerSystem: System Layer: Filtered application logs, no network forwarding
privacy.layerSecurity: Security Layer: Rate limiting without IP tracking, secure session management
privacy.layerNetwork: Network Layer: Clean proxy configuration, privacy-compliant request handling
privacy.collaboratorsDescription: HaqNow works with trusted partners to ensure the highest standards of privacy and security for whistleblowers worldwide.
privacy.collaborateWithUs: Collaborate with us through Ministry of Woke
privacy.partnersDescription: Perfect for security researchers, privacy advocates, journalists, and organizations committed to transparency and accountability.
privacy.verificationDescription: All privacy tasks have been completed and verified:

about.title: HaqNow HakkÄ±nda
about.quote: SavaÅŸlarÄ± sona erdirme ve dÃ¼nyadaki tÃ¼m insanlarÄ±n insan haklarÄ±na tutkulu bir ÅŸekilde baÄŸlÄ±yÄ±m.
about.globalTransparencyDesc: Exposing corruption worldwide through document disclosure
about.humanRightsDesc: Protecting civilians through accountability and transparency
about.antiCorruptionDesc: Fighting systemic corruption through evidence-based exposure
about.missionDesc: HaqNow was created to provide a secure, anonymous platform for exposing corruption worldwide. We believe transparency is the foundation of justice and accountability.
about.featureAnonymousDesc: Complete anonymity for whistleblowers and document providers
about.featureOcrDesc: Automatic text extraction and translation from over 60 languages
about.featureSearchDesc: Powerful search across documents from all countries and regions
about.featureSecureDesc: IP kaydÄ± veya kullanÄ±cÄ± takibi olmadan gizlilik odaklÄ± tasarÄ±m
about.whyMattersDesc: Corruption costs the global economy trillions of dollars annually and affects billions of people. By providing a secure platform for document disclosure, we enable journalists, researchers, and citizens to hold powerful institutions accountable.
about.getInvolvedDesc: Join the fight against corruption by uploading relevant documents, sharing our platform, or contributing to our open-source codebase on GitHub.
about.missionDesc1: HaqNow emerges from a deep commitment to ending systemic corruption that fuels conflicts, undermines human rights, and perpetuates global inequality. Through the power of transparency and document disclosure, we believe that exposing corruption is one of the most effective ways to protect civilians, end wars, and advance human rights worldwide.
about.missionDesc2: Corruption thrives in darkness, protected by secrecy and enabled by those who profit from inequality and conflict. When corrupt officials, defense contractors, and political elites operate without accountability, the result is often devastating: unnecessary wars, human rights abuses, and the systematic exploitation of vulnerable populations. By creating a secure, anonymous platform for whistleblowers and truth-tellers, HaqNow aims to shine light on these dark practices.
about.missionDesc3: Our work is rooted in the understanding that transparency is not just a democratic idealâ€”it's a tool for peace and justice. Every document exposed, every corrupt scheme revealed, and every truth brought to light contributes to a world where accountability replaces impunity, where human rights are protected, and where the powerful can no longer operate with complete disregard for human suffering.
about.featureAnonymousSecureDesc: Advanced encryption and anonymization to protect whistleblowers and sources.
about.featureGlobalAccessDesc: Multi-language support including Arabic, French, German, Russian, Polish, and Turkish.
about.featureOpenArchiveDesc: Searchable database of corruption documents accessible to journalists and researchers.
about.featureFOIDesc: VatandaÅŸlarÄ±n hÃ¼kÃ¼metlerinden ÅŸeffaflÄ±k talep etmelerine yardÄ±mcÄ± olacak kapsamlÄ± FOI kaynaklarÄ±.

foi.title: BÄ°B Bilgileri - Bilgi Edinme HakkÄ± YasalarÄ±
foi.subtitle: Devlet bilgilerine eriÅŸim ve dÃ¼nya Ã§apÄ±nda ÅŸeffaflÄ±ÄŸÄ± destekleme rehberiniz
foi.whatIsDesc1: Freedom of Information (FOI) laws give citizens the right to access government documents, records, and data. These laws are fundamental tools for democracy, transparency, and accountability. They allow journalists, researchers, activists, and ordinary citizens to uncover government activities, expose corruption, and hold public officials accountable.
foi.whatIsDesc2: FOI laws typically cover government agencies, departments, and public institutions. They require these bodies to respond to information requests within specified timeframes, though certain exemptions may apply for national security, personal privacy, or commercial confidentiality reasons.
foi.proTip: ğŸ’¡ Pro Tip: FOI requests are powerful tools for uncovering corruption, government misconduct, and holding power accountable. Combined with platforms like HaqNow, they create a comprehensive approach to transparency and anti-corruption work.
foi.wikipediaLink: Wikipedia's comprehensive article on Freedom of Information laws by country
foi.step1Desc: Determine which government body holds the information you need
foi.step2Desc: Make your request clear, specific, and focused to get better results
foi.step3Desc: Use official portals or contact agencies directly through proper channels
foi.step4Desc: Track your request and appeal if necessary to ensure compliance
foi.countries: Ãœlkelere GÃ¶re Bilgi Edinme YasalarÄ± ve PortallarÄ±
foi.do1: Be specific about dates, departments, and document types
foi.do2: Request information, not opinions or analysis
foi.do4: Be patient but persistent with follow-ups
foi.dont1: Make overly broad or fishing expedition requests
foi.dont2: Request information that clearly falls under exemptions
foi.dont3: Use FOI for personal disputes or harassment
foi.dont4: Expect immediate responses - processing takes time
foi.dont5: Give up after initial rejection without considering appeals
foi.connectionDesc: When FOI requests uncover corruption, HaqNow provides a secure platform to share those documents with the world. Together, they create a comprehensive approach to fighting corruption and promoting transparency.
foi.connectionPoint1: Use FOI to obtain government documents
foi.connectionPoint2: Share important findings anonymously on HaqNow
foi.connectionPoint3: Enable global access to corruption evidence

disclaimer.faqQ1: Is it really safe to upload documents?
disclaimer.faqA1: Yes, if you follow our security guidelines. HaqNow is designed with complete anonymity in mind - we don't store IP addresses, require registration, or log user activity. However, your own security practices are crucial.
disclaimer.faqQ2: Can my government track me if I upload documents?
disclaimer.faqA2: HaqNow cannot be used to identify you, but governments may monitor internet traffic. In high-risk countries, consider using VPN and Tor browser for additional protection. Never use work or government computers.
disclaimer.faqQ3: What if I work for the government or a corporation?
disclaimer.faqA3: NEVER upload from work computers. Corporate and government networks have monitoring software that can detect your activity. Use only personal devices on personal networks. Consider additional privacy tools if you're in a sensitive position.
disclaimer.faqQ4: How do you protect my documents?
disclaimer.faqA4: We automatically strip all metadata from documents, store them securely with encryption, and never associate them with any identifying information. Your documents become completely anonymous once uploaded.
disclaimer.faqQ5: Can I be prosecuted for whistleblowing?
disclaimer.faqA5: Laws vary by country. Some countries have whistleblower protections, others criminalize document disclosure. Research your local laws and consider the risks. We recommend consulting with legal experts familiar with your jurisdiction.
disclaimer.faqQ6: What types of documents should I upload?
disclaimer.faqA6: Upload documents that expose corruption, government misconduct, corporate wrongdoing, or violations of public interest. Avoid uploading documents containing personal information of innocent individuals or classified information that could harm national security.
disclaimer.faqQ7: How can I verify my uploads were successful?
disclaimer.faqA7: After uploading, documents go through an approval process. You can search the site later to see if your documents appear in the public database. We don't provide individual confirmation to maintain anonymity.
disclaimer.faqQ8: What if I need to upload large files?
disclaimer.faqA8: Our system supports large document uploads. If you have extremely large files, consider breaking them into smaller parts or contacting us through secure channels for guidance on bulk uploads.
disclaimer.learnMoreButton: Gizlilik KorumalarÄ±mÄ±z HakkÄ±nda Daha Fazla Bilgi
